raw_sentence: Attached is PG&E 's Gas Accord II ( GA II ) Settlement Proposal .

raw_sentence: We believe it addresses many of the issues and concerns you have raised in the workshops .

raw_sentence: As an overview , this proposal : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord structure in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *
processed_sentence: overview proposal maintain basic gas accord structure place today period

raw_sentence: * Offers end user transportation rates for 2003 lower for most customers than rates in effect today . *
processed_sentence: offer end user transportation rate low customer rate effect today

raw_sentence: * Provides for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customers . *
processed_sentence: provide vintage redwood path rate core customer

raw_sentence: * Offers a 7.5 cent / dth rate to large customers while minimizing rate changes to other customers , minimizing the incentive for these customers to seek to bypass local transmission charges and other CPUC - approved charges . *
processed_sentence: offer cent dth rate large customer minimize rate change customer minimize incentive customer seek bypass local transmission charge cpuc approve charge

raw_sentence: * Adopts guidelines to improve reliability and help moderate prices in gas commodity markets , and identifies the capital projects needed to meet these guidelines over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *
processed_sentence: adopt guideline improve reliability help moderate price gas commodity market identify capital project need meet guideline course ga ii period

raw_sentence: * Provides a high degree of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both inflation and the cost of needed capital projects .
processed_sentence: provide high degree rate stability escalator capture inflation cost need capital project

raw_sentence: The guaranteed rates will be adjustable only for significant changes in the cost of capital or increased costs due to governmental requirements or catastrophic events . *
processed_sentence: guarantee rate adjustable significant change cost capital increase cost due governmental requirement catastrophic event

raw_sentence: * Preserves a rate differential between the Redwood and Baja paths , although somewhat less than the current differential . *
processed_sentence: preserve rate differential redwood baja path although somewhat less current differential

raw_sentence: * Proposes a two - stage open season for firm transportation services beginning in 2003 , with end users receiving a first option on available capacity . *
processed_sentence: propose two stage open season firm transportation service begin end user receive first option available capacity

raw_sentence: * Maintains the core aggregation program with some adjustments .
processed_sentence: maintain core aggregation program adjustment

raw_sentence: PG&E also anticipates that the Core Procurement Incentive Mechanism ( CPIM ) will be similar to today 's mechanism , but will reflect the somewhat larger capacity holdings needed to meet anticipated increases in core demand and to meet a 1 - day in 10 - year cold weather event .

raw_sentence: A state Senate committee is set today to start serving 16 subpoenas on electricity producers and officials who manage California 's energy grid to determine whether they acted in concert to manipulate energy prices .
processed_sentence: state senate committee set today start serve subpoena electricity producer official manage california 's energy grid determine whether act concert manipulate energy price

raw_sentence: The investigative committee , headed by state Sen. Joe Dunn , D - Santa Ana , is focusing on a series of events last fall filled with enough Shakespearean plot twists and intrigue that it has earned a name around the Capitol : " the palace coup . "
processed_sentence: investigative committee head state sen. joe dunn santa ana focus series event last fall fill enough shakespearean plot twist intrigue earn name around capitol palace coup

raw_sentence: Lawmakers and consumer groups allege that the events - directed by the man who heads the state 's energy grid - fueled the California energy crisis , pushed the state into the power - buying business and helped make billions of dollars for power producers .
processed_sentence: lawmaker consumer group allege event direct man head state 's energy grid fuel california energy crisis push state power buy business help make billion dollar power producer

raw_sentence: The central question behind the palace coup is whether Terry Winter , the president of the Independent System Operator , acted alone when he took steps to remove key price caps designed to limit the amount power generators could charge .
processed_sentence: central question behind palace coup whether terry winter president independent system operator act alone take step remove key price cap design limit amount power generator could charge

raw_sentence: Winter defied his own board and Gov. Gray Davis when he filed a 50 - page request to remove the caps , records and interviews show .
processed_sentence: winter defy board gov. gray davis file page request remove cap record interview show

raw_sentence: " I do n't know how these events could have taken place without some concerted effort , " said Dunn .
processed_sentence: know event could take place without concerted effort say dunn

raw_sentence: The subpoenas will force those involved , including Winter , to provide sworn testimony about the events to the committee , and to turn over e-mails , personal calendars and memos .
processed_sentence: subpoena force involve include winter provide swear testimony event committee turn e-mail personal calendar memo

raw_sentence: Davis spokesman Steve Maviglio said the governor felt " betrayed " by the actions of Winter .

processed_sentence: governor believe define moment mount problem turn instant crisis maviglio say

raw_sentence: The decision was made by ISO upper management with one goal in mind : to keep the lights on .

raw_sentence: " It was an emergency , " Fishman said .

raw_sentence: The restrictions would drive prices as low as $ 65 per megawatt - nearly 12 times below the $ 750 per megawatt limits of seven months earlier .

raw_sentence: 1 ) The Italian Renaissance began the opening phase of the Renaissance , a period of great cultural change and achievement in Europe that spanned the period from the end of the 13th century to about 1600 , marking the transition between Medieval and Early Modern Europe .
